name: Jamdani
Description: Jamdani saree is very well known to Bengali women as the inheritor of ancient fine muslin cloth. Jamdani cloth is made by designing on muslin. Although fine, fine and smooth muslin is now extinct due to various reasons in the course of time, a branch of muslin known as jamdani still survives.

name: Katan
Description: Katan silk is created by twisting together filaments to create a very sturdy and long lasting fabric. The fabric gets an interesting textured background by the way of its creation so that any work on the fabric looks unique.

name: Organza
Description: It is a lightweight, plain weave, sheer fabric that is made from silk. Organza silk is a popular saree material among Indian women who look forward to putting together a classy and elegant look. From traditional drape to party look â€“ the organza silk saree makes perfect wear for numerous occasions.
